value.name: Midlothian Officer Who Killed Security Guard Jemel Roberson Will Not Face Charges
value.description: Prosecutors won’t file criminal charges against Ian Covey, a White police officer who shot and killed Jemel Roberson, a Black security guard, outside a south suburban nightclub in 2018.

value.name: Protesters Demand Justice For Jemel Roberson
value.description: It has been 18 months since Roberson, a nightclub security officer, was shot and killed by a Midlothian police officer. CBS 2's Jermont Terry reports. Proposed Legislation Would Prohibit Illinois ...

value.name: Security guard killed by police, mother sues
value.description: The mother of Jemel Roberson, an armed security guard who was shot and killed by a police officer while working at a Chicago bar, has filed a federal lawsuit alleging excessive force. Linda So ...

value.name: White cop not charged in Chicago-area killing of Black guard
value.description: CHICAGO — A white suburban police officer who fatally shot a Black security guard outside of the suburban Chicago bar where he was working will not be charged, prosecutors announced Friday.

value.name: Stephon Clark's Legacy | #EveryonesChild
value.description: Stephon Clark was an unarmed, 22 year-old man, who was fatally shot and killed in his grandmother's backyard in Sacramento, California by two officers from the Sacramento Police Department.
